humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, the sentinel lymph node (specimen B) was negative for tumor by step section and cytokeratin stain. This indicates that there are no metastatic carcinomas in the sentinel lymph node, which aligns with New Rule 10 and New Rule 11. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the right sentinel node (B) was negative for tumor by step section and cytokeratin stain. This indicates that there is no evidence of cancer in the sentinel lymph node, which corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N0.
